system.description: When someone owes you 2 or more Debts and you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.Oy3jQ5vR9wS2xT8u]{lend them a hand or get in their way}, roll with MIND instead of Circle.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: The MC tells you what interesting thing happens.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a hit, give them a +1 or -2 to their roll.

On a 7-9, you expose yourself to danger, entanglement, or cost.

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value: On a hit, give them a +1 or -2 to their roll.
